mapper.insert: insert into success_killed (seckill_id, user_phone, state, create_time) values (#{seckillId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select seckill_id, user_phone, state, create_time from success_killed
